How will you use this is up to you but in my opinion, this is the greatest opportunity for building wealth you will ever get. Millionaires are built-in crises, you just have to do your research and invest when it's the hardest. 6
#nfts #MetaverseNFT #metaverse #cryptocurrency

Just like after every big crisis till now, new industry leaders will start appearing when regulations will be added to the space, the googles and amazons of metaverse will rise from ashes and the building will begin. 5

In 2022 I think we will get p2e/metaverse blow-off top and finally, the bubble will pop. If and when it happens 90% of NFTs will go to zero along with cryptocurrencies. The big crisis will hit and the road will be made for the giants to enter the space. 4

They were able to raise it only because of the perfect timing, with NFT hype and crypto bull run all eyes were, and still are on the blockchain.

So what do i think will happen? 3

Now don't get me wrong, I am 100% believer that metaverse will be part of our everyday lives in the future but we can't just expect it to happen in 2 years.
The valuations some of these companies are getting and the money they have raised is just absurd. 2
